basics.name: Hrvoje Šimić
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full stack Ruby and JavaScript developer with 6+ years of experience. Worked with various US based startups over the years and made some commits to Ruby on Rails core. Focused on working with small teams and building small products from ground up.

work.summary: Currently building an MVP of a time tracking application
Ivypsace is an online knowledge sharing service between mentors from Ivy-league colleges with students from China.
highlights: Converted Reflux based React application to Redux and Redux Saga

work.summary: Currently building an MVP of an online marketplace focused on automotive parts and primarily intended for mobile use.
highlights: Built an MVP from scratch using Ember.js and Ruby on Rails
Implemented integration with peer to peer payment services using both PayPal and Stripe

work.summary: Airbrake is the first and the most popular exception tracking service.
highlights: Maintained an open-source JavaScript and Node.js libraries with thousands of downloads

work.summary: Lessonhub is a custom education-focused content management system used by teachers across the US.
highlights: Built a custom content management system from scratch, with support for math functions and various custom lesson elements, used by teachers for their educational purposes every day
Implemented frontend in Ember.js and the backend in Ruby on Rails
Was in charge of everything related to development, including managing other people that worked on the project

work.summary: Particle is an internet of things cloud platform with a focus of providing easy internet access to Arduino-like boards.
highlights: Built a custom browser-based IDE for their platform from scratch, using Ember.js that communicated with multiple APIs
Built a Rails API with support for submissions of custom third party libraries for the IDE usage

work.summary: Betterdoc is a SaaS that helps its customers with finding the best doctor for their needs.
highlights: Improved the test suite and raised the quality of the existing Ruby on Rails codebase

work.summary: Hiiro was a SaaS for finding high quality contractors, meant to be an alternative to Toptal. Unfortunately, it didn't gain enough traction, so development was discontinued.
highlights: Implemented private exception tracking system for the Ruby on Rails API
Implemented various features using TDD for frontend that was using Angular.js and the backend which was using Ruby on Rails
Refactored large portion of codebase which improved the performance of the API

work.summary: Rackspace is a popular cloud provider and I worked on Airbrake. Airbrake is the first and the most popular exception tracking service.
highlights: Implemented various third party service integrations like Engineyard, Heroku and Jira using TDD
Maintained an open source Ruby gem that integrates with Rails with millions of downloads
Added support for newer versions of Rails to an open source gem
Resolved support issues for over 40,000 monthly active users

work.summary: Showmojo is a small website for managing real estate showings. Backend is written in Ruby on Rails and the frontend is using jQuery.
highlights: Implemented analytics for images rendered on third-party services
Implemented various CSS and JavaScript hacks for IE6
Improved user experience for photo uploads

volunteer.summary: Actively contributing and raising quality of open source software.
highlights: Contributed to Ruby on Rails and made it to top 200 Ruby on Rails contributors of all time
Maintained multiple Ruby gems with millions of downloads
Authored multiple NPM packages with thousands of downloads
Authored a popular Markdown preview tool called Livedown

volunteer.summary: JavaScript users meetup group for Zagreb, Croatia.
highlights: Co-organized dozens of meetups in various places
Gave multiple talks about testing and Ember.js
Co-hosted dozens of events for teaching programming

volunteer.summary: Ruby users meetup group for Zagreb, Croatia.
highlights: Started Ruby meetups in Zagreb, Croatia and organized dozens of meetups and drinkups
Gave a couple of talks about various Ruby topics
